name: NSAppearanceCustomization
desc: A set of methods for getting and setting the appearance attributes of a view.

items.name: var appearance: NSAppearance?
items.desc: The appearance of the receiver, in an NSAppearance object.

items.name: var effectiveAppearance: NSAppearance
items.desc: The appearance that will be used when the receiver is drawn onscreen, in an NSAppearance object. (read-only)
